reviewText: This is a high quality childrens television title.  The Four Seasons:  A change of seasons raises Dooley's curiosity when it affects Mom's garden.  To find out more, the children and M.A.R.T.I.E. try to build a weather machine, learning how to appreciate nature's rhythms and respond to them.  Rainy Day Blues:  Everyone has to cancel plans for a picnic when it rains, but the kids find a way to have fun indoors.  They learn that even though plans must sometimes change, we can overcome disappointment by creating new plans.
